name: Titanium.XML.ProcessingInstruction
summary: A way to keep processor-specific information in the text of the document. Implements the DOM Level 2 API on Android and iOS.

properties.name: data
properties.summary: Retrieve the content of this processing instruction. This from the first non white space character after the target to the character immediatly preceding the ?>. When setting a processing instruction, a DOMException may be thrown on an invalid instruction.

properties.name: target
properties.summary: Retrieve the target of this processing instruction. XML defines this as being the first token following the markup that begins the processing instruction.
